content: --सज्जा, --सज्जिका a woman who dresses herself in all her ornaments and keeps herself (and her house) ready to receive her lover, especially when he has made an appointment with her; an expectant heroine, one of the several classes of a Nāyikā; <ls>S. D.</ls> thus defines her: --कुरुत मंडनं यास्याः(यातु)सज्जिते वासवेश्मनि . सा तु वासकसज्जा स्याद्विदितप्रियसंगमा <ls n="S. D.">120</ls>; भवति विलंबिनि विगलितलज्जा विलपति रेदिति वासकसज्जा <ls>Gīt. 6.</ls>
